name: Tooltip.Root
description: A label that provides information on hover or focus.
description_zh: A label that provides information on hover or focus.

aria-label.description_zh: 工具提示的自定义标签。

closeDelay.description: The close delay of the tooltip.

closeOnClick.description: Whether the tooltip should close on click
closeOnClick.description_zh: 单击时是否应关闭工具提示

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close the tooltip when the Escape key is pressed.
closeOnEscape.description_zh: 是否在按下 Escape 键时关闭工具提示。

closeOnPointerDown.description: Whether to close the tooltip on pointerdown.
closeOnPointerDown.description_zh: 是否在 pointerdown 时关闭工具提示。

closeOnScroll.description: Whether the tooltip should close on scroll
closeOnScroll.description_zh: 工具提示是否应在滚动时关闭

defaultOpen.description:
The initial open state of the tooltip when it is first rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.
defaultOpen.description_zh:
首次呈现工具提示时工具提示的初始打开状态。
在不需要控制其打开状态时使用。

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the tooltip. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: 工具提示中元素的 ID。对合成很有用。

interactive.description:
Whether the tooltip's content is interactive.
In this mode, the tooltip will remain open when user hovers over the content.
interactive.description_zh:
工具提示的内容是否为交互式内容。
在此模式下，当用户将鼠标悬停在内容上时，工具提示将保持打开状态。

openDelay.description: The open delay of the tooltip.

positioning.description: The user provided options used to position the popover content
positioning.description_zh: 用户提供的用于定位弹出框内容的选项

events.name: openChange
events.description: Function called when the tooltip is opened.
events.description_zh: 打开工具提示时调用的函数。
